jobs.title: Creative Front-end Developer
jobs.content:
As a Front-end Developer you are a key-player within our team making sure challenging projects are fully functional, innovative and pixel perfect. You stare constantly at the FPS counter making sure all of your animations and transitions run smooth as butter. You are able to recreate motion examples created in After Effects frame by frame just by using your code editor. Due to our fast-paced industry there’s great freedom to choose new cutting-edge technology on every project.


We find it important to help you grow as a person and in your career. As a growing company we offer several opportunities to learn and advance yourself within Superhero Cheesecake. We care about continuously training our team members into becoming top-notch developers. Our regular code review meetings make sure everybody can learn from mistakes and get up to speed with best practices.

jobs.title: Talented .Net Developer Required in Central London
jobs.content:
We are a small, dynamic start up, looking to hire an experienced .Net developer for a senior role in Clerkenwell, central London.


We are using NLP to add value to Social Media analysis and are building an API to deliver our content.


Our technology stack is largely Microsoft but, as we integrate with other data sources and technologies, a good industry awareness is a real bonus.


As a start-up we value self-reliance and individual contribution; a positive, proactive attitude is as important as good technical skills.However, we are a close-knit team and the successful candidate will enjoy a relaxed, friendly, and rewarding working environment.


 This is an opportunity to help shape the very heart of our product and be instrumental in bringing our offering to market.


Core job requirements



  • Have primary responsibility for development and maintenance of our code base

  • Work with our existing .Net developer in refactoring and streamlining existing code

  • Consult with front end development to provide the API they need

jobs.title: Full Stack Engineer
jobs.content:
Full Stack Engineers are the glue that keeps our Engineering team together. We’re looking for generalists that are as versatile as they are passionate about their craft. You'll help us transform the boutique fitness and gym landscape by creating awesome experiences for people looking to live a more active lifestyle.


We currently run on JavaScript, CSS, Angular, Python, Java, MySQL and more. We make the most of modern tools like React, Webpack and SASS. Whether we're working on a consumer feature or working on our API services, we strive to create the best possible experience for our end users. We’ve built small, tight knit squads so you’ll work closely with a small number of engineers, a designer and product manager on an product that’s seen 10x growth in the last year.


What you'll do



  • Build web and mobile client applications and the backend services to support them



  • Write, review, and discuss efficient and reusable code to build features and tools on our consumer and studio platform



  • Collaborate with the front end and back end, product, design and business intelligence teams

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.content:
Join us!


Want to help us transform one of the few industries where true digitalization is yet to happen?


Min Doktor connects you with a doctor or healthcare specialist at the touch of your hand. We’re an online service that provides evaluation, diagnosis and treatment by medical professionals, all while delivering the same accessibility and convenience that you expect from modern day service providers.


At Min Doktor we’ve built a service that will truly change the way we think about primary care and will certainly improve lives of both patients and doctors.  
We are strengthening our development team to bring the Min Doktor brand and our service to the public and prepare for international expansion.


We haven’t set languages and work methodology in stone but right now the backend is written in Go (golang.org), Angular 1.4x and React Native for the mobile application. If you have no previous experience in those languages that is fine as long as you are willing to learn.

jobs.title: Want to work
jobs.company: scale with Aols advertising Supply Platform? 142B+ Global M
jobs.content:
The Supply Side ad server engineering team is focused on building a high performance, well engineered ad serving product that has 142B+ Global Monthly Impressions.


Help us evolve our architecture where we use technologies such as :-



  • Java, JAX-RS

  • Javascript, Angular

  • Apache Tomcat

  • Jenkins, Maven, Sonar


What You’ll Be Doing


We are focused on quality and this team produces a platform that has very few production issues. If this sounds good to you, and you like to write high quality well tested code, we have  many interesting challenges including



  • Delivering high quality and highly efficient Java code

  • Occasionally involved in production deployment and troubleshooting

  • Be flexible and able to work in a fast-paced Agile environment

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.content:
Build the infrastructure for the next generation of connected devices. Join relayr and build the future today.



Relayr is bringing things to life. We have three technical pillars: an Internet of Things Platform as a Service, open SDKs and a Hardware development platforms designed to allow developers and enterprises to quickly build Internet of Things solutions.


We have a growing number of internal and client projects and are looking for an enthusiastic DevOps Engineer to join our international team in Berlin (we are flexible with working conditions).


Your Tasks:



  • Help build out and scale our platform cluster (AWS, Baremetal, different cloud and virtualization platforms)

  • Help development team to clusterize and scale all application components

  • Strive for many 9’s of uptime

  • Develop Continuous Deployment and Monitoring strategies

  • Help develop long term strategies


Your Skills:



  • A minimum of 3 years experience.

  • Experience in scaling applications, working with clusters

  • Experience with modern tools like Mesos, Consul, Swarm, Docker

  • Understanding of administration of Big Data tools like Cassandra, Kafka, etc.

  • Experience working with Cloud Providers (AWS is a significant bonus)

  • Command line and shell scripting are your friends, languages such as Python, Go and Ruby are constant companions.

  • Deep knowledge of Linux operating system (particularly Debian based)

  • Knowledge of TCP networking stack and ability to design firewalls and security rules. (iptables, ipfw, selinux)

  • Bonus: You have experience with Scala and NodeJs and can dive just a little deeper than reading the stack trace when something goes wrong in production



We Offer:



  • Work in a cool office located in Kreuzberg

  • German courses and Friday evenings get together

  • Connecting you with a network of companies and people all over the world

  • Knowledge sharing from the best entrepreneurs in the industry

  • Easy-integration into a highly professional and passionate team


Sounds interesting? We’d be happy to receive your CV, start date and salary expectations!


Please follow the link to apply for this position: https://relayr.bamboohr.co.uk/jobs/view.php?id=5

jobs.title: Scala IoT Developer
jobs.content:
Relayr is all about bringing things to life. Our platform for the Internet of Things, connects smart devices to each other, and to app developers.


Are you tired of working on mundane IT tasks of yet another advertising platform or clothing reseller? Do you want to make a difference and create the future today?


Then relayr is the right place for you! 


relayr is all about bringing things to life. Our platform for the Internet of Things, connects smart devices to each other, and to app developers. We’ve created three easy tools (Platform as a Service, SDKs and a Sensor-Kit – the WunderBar) which allow developers to quickly program Internet of Things solutions, with sensor data to create applications for their physical surroundings.


As a Scala IoT Developer you would be able to design and implement new features for our platform (Scala, Rest Services, Akka, Postgres, Cassandra, RabbitMQ, etc.), build data streaming / analytics infrastructure and work on scalability / performance problems.


Your tasks:



  • Designing and implementing new features for backend (Scala, Rest Services, Akka, Postgres, Cassandra, RabbitMQ, etc.) You will be involved in designing features, not just implementing them.

  • Help building data streaming / analytics infrastructure to process data from sensors.

  • Working on scalability / performance problems.

  • Actively communicating with our existing team of Scala developers, DevOps, Front End and Community teams.


We Offer:



  • A cool office located in Kreuzberg, German courses and Friday evening get togethers

  • Connecting you with a network of companies and people from all over the world

  • Knowledge sharing from the best entrepreneurs in the industry

  • Easy integration into a highly professional and passionate team


Sound interesting? We’d be happy to receive your CV, start date and salary expectations!


 Please follow the link to apply for this position: https://relayr.bamboohr.co.uk/jobs/view.php?id=12

jobs.title: NodeJS Developer
jobs.content:
Our platform for the Internet of Things, connects smart devices to each other, and to app developers.


You dreamt of building the future but find yourself bored of working on the mundane tasks of yet another mobile advertising platform or clothing e-tailer?


Then relayr is the right place for you!


Our platform for the Internet of Things, connects smart devices to each other, and to app developers. We’ve created three easy tools (Platform as a Service, SDKs and a Sensor-Kit – the WunderBar) which allow developers to quickly program Internet of Things solutions, with sensor data to create applications for their physical surroundings.


We have a growing number of internal and client projects and are looking for an enthusiastic NodeJS Developer to join our international team in Berlin!


Your Tasks:



  • Work with internal libraries and services to build both prototyped and ready-to-market solutions

  • Add value with every iteration to solve problems fast

  • Design and build independent micro service components

  • Collaborate with cloud and hardware teams to give feedback on internal systems and define new features


We Offer:

  • Connecting you with a network of companies and people all over the world

Sounds interesting? We’d be happy to receive your CV, start date and salary expectations!


Please follow the link to apply for this position: https://relayr.bamboohr.co.uk/jobs/view.php?id=1

jobs.title: Software Engineer Full Stack/Node.js
jobs.content:
• Design and development of our new high performance service platform with Node.js

  • Implementation and advancement of already established and new interfaces

  • Active involvement within the agile development of our system

  • Use of new technologies (e.g. Docker, ElasticSearch, AWS, Kafka)

jobs.title: AWS Operations Engineer
jobs.content:
Position Summary
The Higher Logic platform resides within Amazon Web Services (AWS). The Operations Engineer is responsible for managing the AWS environment and implementing best practices.


Major Responsibilities 



  • Implement and manage continuous delivery systems and methodologies 

  • Understand, implement and automate security controls, governance processes, and compliance validation 

  • Define and deploy monitoring, metrics, and logging systems 

  • Implement systems that are highly available, scalable, and self-healing 

  • Design, manage and maintain tools to automate operational processes

jobs.title: Frontend, React.js Engineer
jobs.content:
Hello React.js Engineers.

Ever dreamed of disrupting an entire industry?

In the last 2 years, the share of mobile job applications went from 15% to 75%. We are building the most mobile-native way to look for and apply to jobs: meet HeyJobs. We're an award winning team (Apple's & Google's "App of the Year 2015") that has managed to attract more than 7 million users from all over the world with our previous products and we're now building out HeyJobs to change the lives of millions of people. Based in Berlin, we have attracted 4 Million € in funding from some of the best investors across Europe.  


But now it's time for us to get help. We are looking for experienced react wizards that share our vision and want to build something exciting and fresh from the ground app. Our vision is to connect millions of people with great employers and jobs which match their personal interests and current life situation. Doing so will improve the lives of millions of people.


Your role
As a core member of our front-end team, you will build modern & mobile-first web interfaces and work with cutting edge technology. You will have a direct influence on anything you build: We know what we want to do, but if you know a better solution, we will go your way! Our tech stack is RoR 4.2.5, React, Redux, Xamarin C# cross-platform mobile development, etc. If you are a team player that can talk code and English and constantly thinking how to improve the user interface and user experience, we would love to hear from you!

jobs.title: Software Development Java EE for people and car access solutions
jobs.content:
The fact that you’re joining a worldclass
company is not all that unusual.
But finding that start-up spirit still alive at
SKIDATA may well come as a surprise.


This global leader in access solutions is seeking an experienced programming talent (m/f) for


Software Development Java EE


The technology behind our turnstile gates and access readers perhaps comes as a revelation, but it is already working efficiently in over 100 countries – for example, in ski resorts, airports, stadiums and theme parks.


YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES


You plan and develop Java Enterprise applications and services. In doing so you work with software teams around the world – in Austria, France, India and the USA.


WE SURPRISE WITH



  • State of the art software tools

  • Freedom that motivates

  • An international team of specialists

  • The attraction of an international market leader

  • Good development opportunities

  • Global prospects

jobs.title: Software Engineer E-mobility
jobs.content:
Ter versterking van ons team is VDL ETS te Helmond & Valkenswaard op zoek naar een:


Software Engineer E-Mobility




Wil jij aan de basis staan van de bus van morgen en meewerken aan schonere en lichtere bussen? Dan is deze functie wellicht iets voor jou.

De functie
Voor de functie Software Engineer E-mobility zijn wij op zoek naar een proactieve collega die uitdaging ziet in het ontwikkelen, implementeren en testen van software voor elektrisch aangedreven voertuigen. De hoeveelheid en de verwevenheid van embedded systemen in openbaar vervoer- en tourbussen neemt ieder jaar verder toe. Als software engineer sta je aan de basis van de E-architectuur van de toekomst binnen de afdeling voorontwikkeling. De software engineer vervult vanaf het opstellen van de gebruikerseisen tot en met de inbedrijfstelling op locatie (zowel nationaal als internationaal) een uitvoerende en controlerende rol.

Tijdens de engineeringsfase analyseer je de wensen en functionele eisen van de opdrachtgever en ontwerp je de besturingsoplossing, hierbij werk je veelal samen met de diverse engineers en samen bepaal je de meest ideale oplossing. Gedurende de projectuitvoering onderhoud jij intensief contact met de onderaannemer en klant/opdrachtgever. Je stuurt de onderaannemer aan en bent zijn contactpersoon. Je rapporteert naar het projectmanagement en de klant/opdrachtgever. Ook het ondersteunen in het maken van calculaties is onderdeel van je functie. Je bent de spreekwoordelijke ‘spin in het web’ op gebied van software.

Standplaats
De uitvalsbasis is de High Tech Automotive Campus in Helmond of het hoofdkantoor van VDL Bus & Coach te Valkenswaard. Afhankelijk van het project kan het ook zijn dat je op regelmatige basis de productielocaties in Eindhoven, Heerenveen en Roeselare (België) bezoekt.

jobs.title: Creative Thinker
jobs.content:
Horizon is fun, challenging, fast-paced and exciting. We have no shortage of interesting and challenging software problems that need solving. While many of our software stacks include Python, we are not set on any one framework or development stack and are eager to expand our own technological horizons within the FOSS community. Our development process most closely resembles an Agile approach. 


We are looking for an experienced, hard working, and friendly developer to join our talented team at Horizon Investments in Charlotte, NC.  Our office environment is emblematic of a growing business. While working remotely does occur here on occasion, we believe that earnest face-to-face conversation is often required to collaborate and solve hard challenges. As such, this is a full-time, on-site role. 


Flexible work hours are available.

jobs.title: Apputvecklare
jobs.content:
Brinner du för utveckling av mobila applikationer och vill jobba och utvecklas tillsammans med några av Sveriges pionjärer inom området? Vi har sedan starten 2009 stor efterfrågan på våra tjänster vilket har lett till att vi blev Gasellvinnare 2015. Vi behöver därför hjälp av nya duktiga medarbetare för att möta våra kunders efterfrågan.


Vi har ett stort antal projekt bakom oss och har jobbat/jobbar med flera starka varumärken, några som kan nämnas är Spotify, Blocket, Coop, Findus, SvD, TV4, Prisjakt, H&M, Betsson mfl. För stunden behöver vi främst stärka upp vårt iOS- och Android-team och letar därför efter dig som kan identifiera dig med nedanstående profil.



  • Du har erfarenhet av apputveckling.

  • Du är utåtriktad, självständig, initiativrik samt intresserad och öppen för ny teknik och nya möjligheter.

  • Du har minst 2 års erfarenhet av systemutveckling.

  • Du behärskar engelska språket både i tal och i skrift.


Placeringsort är Karlshamn men uppdrag utanför Karlshamnsområdet kan förekomma.


Vi är ett bolag skapat av utvecklare vilket gör att vi hela tiden sätter utvecklaren i fokus och det är hon/han som är hjälten i vår organisation. Lever du upp till våra krav vill vi erbjuda dig en spännande anställning med stor flexibilitet och stort personligt ansvar i ett företag där kvalité och kundtillfredsställelse är ledstjärnor.


Känner du att ovanstående verkar spännande är du välkommen att skicka din ansökan i form av CV och personligt brev till hello@appcorn.se. Oavsett bakgrund, erfarenhetsnivå och roll så tror vi på individen i alla lägen, därför välkomnar vi givetvis sökande oavsett kön eller etnicitet.

jobs.title: Visualization/Front-End Developer
jobs.content:
Our design-led, multidiscipline Centre for Innovation will research, incubate and pilot new and emerging digital technologies. Operating across all stages of the innovation spectrum, the working environment will be open and interactive. An experimentation culture combined with a disruptive brief will ensure that together we make major societal impacts.


Front-end engineers play a key role supporting both rapid prototyping and development of refined proof of concepts. You should have an excellent track record of developing customer-facing digital products while also being curious about the future of human computer interaction. This role provides the opportunity to learn and develop with AR, VR, gestural and conversational-UI, while working with highly impactful domains like policing, healthcare and ad-tech.

jobs.title: Software/ System Architect Manager
jobs.content:
Our design-led, multidiscipline Centre for Innovation will research, incubate and pilot new and emerging digital technologies. Operating across all stages of the innovation spectrum, the working environment will be open and interactive. An experimentation culture combined with a disruptive brief will ensure that together we make major societal impacts.


We are looking for a lead architect and expert for Accenture’s analytics platform architecture and solutions. You will deal with complex, interrelated applications and systems being designed for today’s data analytics platforms, and will work with rapidly evolving technologies and many of the world’s leading organizations to analyse and define unique solutions.


You will also provide thought leadership and drive architecture and the design of analytics solutions for Accenture’s customers, and will demonstrate the understanding of concepts, best practices and functions to implement a data analytics solution in a corporate environment.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.content:
Our design-led, multidiscipline Centre for Innovation will research, incubate and pilot new and emerging digital technologies. Operating across all stages of the innovation spectrum, the working environment will be open and interactive. An experimentation culture combined with a disruptive brief will ensure that together we make major societal impacts.


We are looking for talented and passionate software engineers to join our data analytics team. Accenture’s analytics products and solutions need to handle information at a massive scale. You will bring fresh ideas from all areas centered around distributed computing and large-scale software design, ranging from data engineering (ingestion and processing) to insightful analytics (data mining and machine learning).


You will work closely with an internal team of highly skilled technical resources, and develop robust and scalable software solutions critical to Accenture’s analytics product offering.



  • Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve analytics software and systems (platforms & services).

  • High quality, fast delivery of software systems through integrating cutting-edge software modules (open-source or commercial) and rapid prototyping of algorithms and conceptual designs (e.g. Proof-of-Concepts).

jobs.title: Innovation Experience
jobs.content:
Our design-led, multidiscipline Centre for Innovation will research, incubate and pilot new and emerging digital technologies. Operating across all stages of the innovation spectrum, the working environment will be open and interactive. An experimentation culture combined with a disruptive brief will ensure that together we make major societal impacts.


You will be part of the Innovation Experience Team who will be focused on creating workshops & experiences from the Centre of Innovation to our clients. The goals of the team for the first year are to:



  1. Engage clients in a new way that’s open’s their eyes to the Innovative side of Accenture

  2. Build a pipeline for co-creation projects in the Centre

  3. Showcase the best of the Centre to those who do not work there


Within this team, you will work directly with the workshop designers to create and translate UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with workshop designers and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how an application looks as well as how it works for each of the clients visiting the Centre.

jobs.title: Digital Interaction Design Analyst
jobs.content: Our design-led, multidiscipline Centre for Innovation will research, incubate and pilot new and emerging digital technologies. Operating across all stages of the innovation spectrum, the working environment will be open and interactive. An experimentation culture combined with a disruptive brief will ensure that together we make major societal impacts. The Digital Interaction Designer is involved in and contributes to the conceptual development and delivery of visual/interaction design for Digital projects. You will possess excellent visual design skills and specialise in Web and Mobile design. You can contribute to design projects and pitches and have an appreciation of interaction design. You can communicate effectively and possesses a commercial understanding and awareness.

jobs.title: Full stack software engineers for varied projects with expanding consultancy
jobs.content:
Zuhlke is a European software engineering consultancy that helps businesses turn ideas into reality. We need people who are capable, talented, and engaged to help build systems for our clients, based mainly in our expanding Manchester office. We take on interesting projects in many domains, including media, finance, heavy engineering, and medical devices.


Your job will involve working closely with clients to develop, test, and ship software that meets their needs. You will be looking both to contribute to the company and to grow personally.


Our reputation is fundamental to our business, so our culture emphasizes quality, reliability and respect. As a privately-held company owned by past and present employees, and run by engineers, Zuhlke takes a long-term view. For example, you will receive twenty days training per year, including a budget to support activities such as conference attendance, our annual technical camp, and participation in focused topic teams. We like our staff to be technically flexible so, if you don’t have a required skill now, we can support you learning it.


Your job will include:



  • Helping our clients understand what they really need

  • Building quality systems to satisfy those needs

  • Working collaboratively with colleagues and clients

  • Keeping technically sharp

  • Getting things done

  • Sometimes travelling to other locations in the UK and mainland Europe


You will benefit from:



  • A generous allowance for training (9% of your time and a budget)

  • An achievement-based career path where you can gain responsibility while remaining technical

  • A competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package


Our work is mainly at or within an hour's travel from our Central Manchester office.


If this appeals, then please get in touch.


We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, or disability status.

jobs.title: iOS Developers
jobs.content:
At Sports Tracker, we build apps used by millions of people, and we take great pride in our work. This means excellent development practices, careful code architecture, and an organization built around rapid releases. With a strong focus on delightful user experiences, we balance building new features, refactoring code, and tweaking existing features based on analytics data. Every line of code gets reviewed by other developers, every pixel inspected by designers, and every feature hammered on by manual and automated QA. We have offices in Helsinki, Vantaa & Tampere.


We are looking for enthusiastic and experienced iOS Developers who want to take their skills to the next level by joining our awesome iOS team!


You will get the chance to work in a highly motivated, agile and self-organized team of SW engineers and UX designers. In your work you get to use cutting edge technology and SW platforms (Swift / Reactive Extensions). Your work will include planning, implementing and maintaining new and existing features whilst ensuring quality and usability of our award winning App.

jobs.title: Android Developers
jobs.content:
At Sports Tracker, we build apps used by millions of people, and we take great pride in our work. This means excellent development practices, careful code architecture, and an organization built around rapid releases. With a strong focus on delightful user experiences, we balance building new features, refactoring code, and tweaking existing features based on analytics data. Every line of code gets reviewed by other developers, every pixel inspected by designers, and every feature hammered on by manual and automated QA. We have offices in Helsinki, Vantaa & Tampere.


We are now looking for enthusiastic and experienced Android Software Engineers who want to take their skills to the next level by joining our awesome Android team!


You will get the chance to work in a highly motivated, agile and self-organized team of engineers UX designers, QA and product managers. In your work you have the opportunity to use cutting edge technology in building new exciting features and implement dp perfect designs with advanced animations.

jobs.title: Share our Pride - Make A Difference With Leonardo
jobs.content:
We are looking for motivated and adaptable individuals to fill multiple roles across our growing software communities at Capability Green, Luton and Edinburgh. We want YOU to become part of one of our integrated teams within one of our lines of business contributing to the development of current and future state-of-the-art products such as


-  providing the primary sensors for the Typhoon fighter jet or the SAAB Gripen fighter;


-  one of our laser target designator or laser ranging systems for unmanned aircraft;


-  electronic countermeasures and integrated defensive aids system that protect our clients


-  designing and delivering new customer facing projects across land and naval sectors 


We have opportunities for Software & Senior Software and Principal Software Engineers. We also have multiple roles for Systems/Senior Systems Engineers and Systems Architects across our main sites at EDINBURGH, LUTON AND BASILDON.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer  Microsoft Stack- Continuous Delivery - Azure SaaS PaaS
jobs.content:
We are looking for a talented DevOps engineer that is passionate about technology, loves learning new skills and want to work for a company where delivering software is the primary focus of the business rather than an ancillary service.


This is an opportunity to work for a progressive forward thinking company where the product development team is the backbone of the company. You will be working on a new and interesting project and will gain exposure to the latest technologies, whilst at the same time having some fun and working with a great bunch of people. If you are passionate about delivering great SaaS solutions and want to work somewhere where a blind insistence on suits, tidy haircuts and lumbering bureaucracy is actively shunned in favour of pragmatic focus on being effective and doing things well.


You will be operating as a DevOps engineer supporting the wider product development team and interfacing with the service delivery organisation. You will be taking a lead in defining and implementing Perfect Channels continuous delivery strategy in support of the delivery of our flagship PaaS and SaaS trading product. In addition you will be involved in providing ongoing support to our cross functional scrum development teams and oversight in relation to the improvement and ongoing maintenance of the delivery pipeline. You will also be involved in supporting and managing release of key application updates.


You will be comfortable working with a mature Agile delivery organisation and ideally will have experience working in accordance with processes based on agile frameworks such as scrum and or Kanban.


Maintaining a team centric philosophy is fundamental to the success of our delivery process so everyone is encouraged to take responsibility; we share in success when things are going well and everyone owns the problems when they are not.


We know that everyone has different strengths and ambitions and that individuals bring different contributions to the team. We want you to be able to play to your strengths, and be interested in what you do. We aim to offer career progression that aligns your interests with the interests of the business. If you love working with technology we aren't going to insist that you climb the management ladder to advance your career, we want you to be happy and we will reward you for doing what you do best. On the other hand if your future ambitions lie in leadership or elsewhere we will see how we can help with those too.


You won’t find a stuffy inflexible corporate environment or approach, we like to be more laid back and have fun while we work, however we are deadly serious about delivering quality products and doing things well. We encourage continuous improvement and our teams are empowered to change the way we do things to ensure we always employ the most effective approach possible.

jobs.title: Senior Unity Developer required for HTC Vive VR project.
jobs.content:
Masters of Pie are looking for an experienced Unity developer to help us with building an ambitious, experimental, collaborative Vive (and potentially Hololens) tool for the workplace. If you are interested in building software tools that work with the very latest in VR and AR technology and may even change the way we interface with digital content in the workplace then we would love to chat with you.

Broadly speaking, your tasks would include experimenting with spatial (virtual) user interfaces, exploring collaborative work environments in VR and working with CAD based data sets.


You will need to be able to work from our London studio. No remote work or studios please. The position is available for an immediate start.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.content:
We are now looking for an enthusiastic and experienced Backend Developer to build first class digital services platform and APIs for Sports Tracker in Tampere or Vantaa (Finland)!

In your work you have the opportunity to use cutting edge technology developing Sports Trackers platforms and products further. We hope you have a passion for adopting new software platforms and skills and a desire to create first class solutions.

jobs.title: Senior 3D Unity Artist
jobs.content:
Senior 3D Unity Artist (f/m)


As an enforcement of our Staging Team you get involved in the gamification of a product for configurator, browser, mobile devices and virtual reality. Your objective is to create an interactive experience that triggers inducement off at the end consumer’s side.


Responsibilities


High-end product visualization meets serious gaming.


In your new role you will:



  • Model, shade, light and animate with equal proficiency

  • Apply a strong knowledge of the Unity game engine

  • Write scripts to participate in VFX production processes

  • Demonstrate the ability to work in 2D and 3D

  • Take responsibility for other Technical Artist duties

jobs.title: Software/Senior Software Engineers - SEL004615
jobs.content:
We are looking for motivated and adaptable Software Engineers to join our growing software community at Capability Green, Luton. As part of an integrated team  within the Electronic Warfare Line of Business, you will be contributing to the development of current and future products. These include radar warning receivers (RWR), electronic support measures (ESM), electronic countermeasures (ECM) and integrated defensive aids systems (IDAS). This will provide you with the opportunity to develop your skills across a wide range of products and technologies. Dependent on the experience of the candidate this is a Software or Senior Software position.


Working as part of an established software development team and supported by a team of experienced engineers you will be responsible for:



  • Specification, design, coding and testing of complex real-time embedded software.

  • Developing and applying your knowledge of software engineering to undertake and support various tasks, delivering to agreed performance targets, cost and schedule.

  • Developing practical skills in design techniques for land, sea and aerospace applications, understanding key processes and technologies, and developing software using state-of-the-art modelling tools, compilers and test environments

  • Working closely with Systems engineers and Hardware engineers to solve real  integration problems on complex systems.

  • Completing tasks in accordance with appropriate processes and procedures Taking an active role in engineering process improvement.

jobs.title: Continuous Integration Engineer
jobs.content:
The HERE Release Management & Engineering team, which promotes Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) within the company, is looking for experienced Continuous Integration Engineer to develop and extend our CI infrastrucutre. We are providing CI as a service for developer teams within the company, and the focus on CI/CD testing.


Candidates should have around 4-5 years of professional  experience in DevOps/CI, preferably including intermediate knowledge of software development and automated testing disciplines.


You will get an opportunity to become a member of our dynamic and fast paced 40+ nationality community, develop innovative test tool approaches, and work on new technologies.


The responsibilities include:



  • Development of company´s internal CI system, providing a comprehensive API for CI/CD.



  • Contributing to the design of those services.



  • Working with development teams to provide support and solution for  automation.



  • Promoting continuous integration & continuous delivery within the company.



  • Driving innovation around CI.

jobs.title: Python Software Engineer
jobs.content:
Mid to Senior level developer in an environment that lets you write interesting code and see it in production for clients in a short cycle. You like flexibility and thinking of creative solutions, and enjoy the challenge of producing work fast and accurately. Our challenge is to become more organised and focus on quality - you will come with ideas and solutions.


You’ll be developing new functionality, customizing existing reports and optimizing our growing system as we grow from 10M to 100M+ records. The system itself is on the cutting edge of SaaS, based on Amazon Web Services, using advanced features to bring reliability, performance and security to our clients.


If you are interested in working on a B2B SaaS and developing great features this is your chance. It's a great way into business software - you will learn how to make applications  integrate into business processes.


Adapting or creating new functions for them is a great way of learning how big companies work.


You can rapidly take on more responsibility and develop your career as we grow, and benefit from the rewards that come from being in a profitable start-up.


With the possibility to advance your career depending on results.


We will consider assisting EU and non-EU candidates who want to move to Amsterdam.

jobs.title: Devops Engineer
jobs.content:
We are hiring for Devops Engineer for our consumer experiences team based in Berlin.


HERE is a leader in mapping and location technology. We enable rich, real-time location applications and experiences for consumers, vehicles, enterprises and cities. Our open location platform is accessible to all customers who seek to leverage the power of location in their businesses.


About the Team: The Consumer Experience team builds apps for web and mobile that are used by millions worldwide. Check out what our team builds at https://maps.here.com/and learn more about HERE on our blog at http://360.here.com/

In this team we are strong believers in the DevOps paradigm and Continuous Delivery. Our team consists of DevOps engineers working side by side with web and mobile development teams to deliver features and improvements to our users on a daily basis. We practice automation on every level, running tests and deployments all the way up to production. We deploy automatically and continuously to production every day. Our systems serve millions of unique users per month, hosted in a global multi-region setup. We are always looking to improve performance, scalability and reliability.


Responsibilities



  • Maintain and improve build, test and deployment automation

  • Continuous Delivery focus to allow quick feedback to developers and deploy often

  • Work with operations and development to troubleshoot and fix problems

  • Develop new ways to automate testing and expand the coverage

  • Administration of CI systems like Jenkins and Gerrit

  • Maintain AWS cloud based R&D environments

jobs.title: Senior/Principal Software Engineer - SEL004628
jobs.content:
About the role


The Software Engineering function in Edinburgh have multiple opportunities for software engineers to join one of our multi-disciplinary integrated project teams (IPT) to contribute to the solving of real-life engineering problems on state-of-the-art avionics sensor systems such as: the radar for the Typhoon fighter jet; the radar for the SAAB Gripen fighter; one of our family of Surveillance AESA Radars (Active Electronically Scanned Array); an IRCM (Infra–Red Counter Measures) system; or perhaps on one of our laser target designator or laser ranging systems.


There are opportunities at all levels: Software Engineer, Senior Software Engineer and Principal Software Engineer levels depending on the skills and experience of the candidate.


Key Responsibilities



  • Software development may include the full software lifecycle from requirements analysis; through design, coding and unit test; to integrating the software with the hardware target; and lastly to acceptance test and delivery to the customer.

  • As a software engineer, you are responsible for creating high quality and robust code; for fully documenting and recording your work products; keeping them under configuration management and providing plans and reports on progress to your supervisor.

  • The functionality provided by the software is extensive and varied, such as Radar control and mode selection, target tracking, Signal Processing mode algorithms and hardware interfacing.

  • You will develop practical skills in design techniques for aerospace applications, understanding of key processes and technologies, and develop software using state-of-the-art modelling tools, compilers and test environments.

  • You will work closely with Systems engineers and Electronics engineers to solve real integration problems on a complex system.

  • Depending on your level of experience, you may be required to supervise a small team of engineers and you will then be responsible for planning and managing the work for yourself and your team; for coaching more junior team members and ensuring a robust engineering solution for the team’s work packages.

  • There may be opportunities to contribute towards the investigation and analysis of leading edge development methodologies and influence the future path of software development within Selex ES.

  • Most training will be delivered via on-the-job experience working in real software teams within project groups delivering sensor systems to our customers. Additional formal technical training to augment the on-the-job training may be provided via taught courses depending on the business needs.

jobs.title: Test Automation Specialist
jobs.content:
We are looking for a Test Automation Specialist to join our Software team in Suunto headquarters in Vantaa. 


This is a great opportunity for you if you are interested and enjoy designing test automation software for high tech consumer products. Active lifestyle and interest for sports is considered as a plus.

Your main responsibility as a Test Automation Lead Designer/Architect is to provide technical leadership and architectural structure to the design and development of the test automation solution with a team of a DevOps professionals. You’ll be working both with simulation environment and real hardware. Together with our team you innovate and create new test automation solutions for Suunto's products and solutions.

jobs.title: Sr. Software Engineer
jobs.content:
We are hiring for Senior Engineer passionate for Quality for our Map Data Delivery Team in Berlin.


Do you want to work on projects with an amazing scale and develop solutions for millions of users? Keep reading!


To learn more about HERE, including our work in the areas of connected and autonomous driving, visit http://360.here.com orhttps://company.here.com/here/”


Join our fast growing, highly motivated Map Data Delivery team as an experienced Software Engineer passionate for building the map in Berlin, Germany. You will be responsible for development, test and operation of map build pipeline which creates map artifacts used by other teams and customers.


In an agile context, we offer



  • Be part of a fast-growing team that create the map that is use by millions of users daily!

  • To work with evolving and challenging technologies and be part the map of the future

  • To work F2F with real experts in the field in an international environment

  • To develop scalable, flexible and comprehensive tested solutions

  • A chance to contribute to the current and future products we are proud of.


Some of the responsibilities you will have in our team (but are not limited to):



  • Contributing to Map Test Framework by coding in Python

  • Developing and maintaining parts of Map build pipeline(using Jenkins and shell scripting)

  • Automating test workflows as much as possible

  • Proactively contacting stakeholders on dailybasis

  • Bringing our Map build pipelines to the next level

jobs.title: Full-stack webdeveloper
jobs.content:
Kom jij bij ons werken aan dé IT-innovatie op het gebied van klantgericht bouwen? De Twee Snoeken is een softwareontwikkelaar én multidisciplinair architectenbureau. Wij bieden een afwisselende functie in een technology driven organisatie.


Functieomschrijving


Als full stack webdeveloper ga je werken aan de webbased configurator WoonConnect, het meest innoverende product op het gebied van klantgericht bouwen. Met WoonConnect kunnen gebruikers online nieuwe woningen samenstellen en bestaande woningen aanpassen aan individuele wensen. De 3D informatiemodellen in de configurator zijn interactief en dynamisch.


De applicaties waar je aan werkt worden direct gebruikt door woningcorporaties, huurders, huiseigenaren, aannemers, etc. Voor elk project bouwen we een nieuwe configuratorsite op basis van de WoonConnect-technologie. Jij bent verantwoordelijk voor het doorontwikkelen van de onderliggende configuratortechniek. Je bouwt applicaties waarmee de gebruiker inzicht krijgt in het gebouwmodel, energieverbruik, kosten, etc.


Heb je genoeg van het ontwikkelen van droge applicaties die ergens op de achtergrond draaien? Bij ons kun je in een compact team werken aan een vernieuwend product, waarmee iedereen spelenderwijs digitaal kan bouwen en zijn eigen woonomgeving kan verbeteren.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer, Enterprise Applications
jobs.content:
Join our team and experience Workday!


It's fun to work in a company where people truly believe in what they're doing. At Workday, we're committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the business of enterprise applications. We work hard, and we're serious about what we do. But we like to have a good time, too. In fact, we run our company with that principle in mind every day: One of our core values is fun.

jobs.title: QA-ENGINEER SECURITY
jobs.content:
Gestalte mit der E-POST die digitale Zukunft der Deutschen Post. Die Deutsche Post E-POST Development GmbH ist ein innovatives Internet-Unternehmen in der Oberbaum City Berlin, das an DevOps glaubt, Agilität lebt, kurze Kommunikationswege hat und Tag für Tag daran arbeitet, noch besser zu werden. Wir sind eine Tochtergesellschaft des Unternehmensbereiches Post - eCommerce - Parcel (PeP) von Deutsche Post DHL Group – der Post für Deutschland, dem Paketdienstleister für Europa und weltweitem Logistikdienstleister für den Online-Handel.


Deine Kernaufgaben


Du arbeitest in einem Information-Security Team und sorgst mit dafür, dass IT-SECURITY bei der E-POST weiterhin groß geschrieben wird. Zu Deinen Aufgaben gehört die Überprüfung der Einhaltung von Sicherheitsanforderungen, Sichtung und Bewertung von Advisories, die Administration der Web-Application-Firewall, die Definition und Implementierung von Prozessen zur Erhöhung des Sicherheitsniveaus von Anwendungen und Systemen sowie die Mitarbeit an Sicherheits­architekturen und Konzepten.


Deine Fähigkeiten und Erfahrungen



  • Mehrjährige praktische Erfahrungen in Bereichen der IT-Security, besonders unter Linux; Kenntnisse von SELinux sind von Vorteil

  • Kenntnisse in den Bereichen des OWASP

  • Sehr gute Kenntnisse in den Bereichen Linux, SQL-Datenbanken, Middleware, Netzwerktechnologien und Kryptographie

  • Erfahrungen in der Anwendung von IT-Sicherheitstools, wie z.B. Burp, Nessus, Nmap, Wireshark etc.

  • Starke Ziel- und Ergebnisorientierung sowie Flexibilität und Kreativität verbunden mit erfahrungsbasiertem Pragmatismus

  • Deine Deutschkenntnisse entsprechen mindestens dem B2-Level


Dein Kontakt


Rita Heise-Ruppert, Telefon: +49 228 182 669 03

jobs.title: Dveloppeur ASP.NET MVC
jobs.content:
Imaginer, avec l'aide des médecins, les applications de télémédecine de demain, ça vous tente ?


Sous la supervision du directeur technique, vous intégrez une équipe jeune et dynamique avec les missions suivantes :

  • Participer à l'amélioration continue du processus de développement en apportant votre regard et votre expérience sur notre mode de fonctionnement

jobs.content: Dzia "Nowe Media" Grupy Bauer (Wydawnictwo Bauer, Interia, RMF FM) poszukuje kandydata na stanowisko programisty. Do jego zada bdzie naleao projektowanie, rozwój, testowanie i utrzymanie aplikacji na potrzeby wewntrzne Grupy Bauer.

jobs.title: Revolutionary Front End Developer
jobs.content:
We're looking for an experienced software developer to strengthen the ui development knowledge within our services. You enjoy developing browser based user interfaces and ES2016 is a thing you have accepted. You might have already tried out a world without jQuery and felt empowered by it. You are not afraid of new technologies and are ready to delve into the unknown. You appreciate reusable components and efficiency. You are not afraid to let old solutions go if the matter at hand requires it.

We offer innovative and comprehensive solutions for customers within and outside our corporation. High volume job applicant services are a part of our area of expertise. You will work in a solution based environment where you will work as a part of a team of experienced design and development experts. You will have the chance to solve a multitude of issues and develop on a plethora of new ideas focused on improving the work-life, recruitment and HR matters. You will improve our ways of developing our user experience to the next level in collaboration with our designers.

jobs.title: Computer Vision Engineer
jobs.content:
Wikitude has an immediate opening for a Software Developer (full time or internship) who will work in the Wikitude engineering team and develop the core Wikitude Augmented Reality SDK and the Computer Vision components of the Wikitude SDK. The position will have the added benefit of working with a young, dynamic and highly experienced team in the flexible environment of an emerging startup.

Responsibilities will include all aspects of software development from design to coding and testing.


Successful candidates will be highly motivated, self-driven and willing to work on-site in Salzburg to achieve project and company goals.

You will have a strong desire to learn new technologies and work on cutting edge technology. Applicants from the European Union are encouraged to apply! Starting salary is EURO 2,700.00 per month (gross), with the potential for higher salary depending on qualifications and experience.

The Computer Vision Specialist position is based in Wikitude’s HQ office in Salzburg and for highly qualified candidates we also provide the possibility for remote work!

jobs.title: Senior C++ Engineer - On-Device Search
jobs.content:
We are looking for a passionate engineer with excellent C++ skills to help improve our on-device local search; the position is located in Berlin, Germany


About HERE


HERE, a Nokia company, offers the world’s freshest maps and location experiences across multiple screens and operating systems. Formerly known as NAVTEQ and Nokia Location & Commerce, we established our new unified brand in 2012. HERE inspires a new generation of location services and devices helping more people to navigate their lives with ease and confidence every day and everywhere. Built on 30 years of experience in cartography and drawing on more than 80,000 sources of data, HERE offers “Maps for Life” for 196 countries, voice guided navigation in 95 countries, live traffic information for 41 countries, and support over 50 languages. Our maps can be found in 4 out of 5 in-car navigation systems in North America and Europe. We have powered mobile and web companies for more than 10 years. Our customers include Amazon, Yahoo, Garmin, BMW, Toyota, and many more. We are very proud of being the largest and most highly-trained team of map-makers on the planet with 6,000 people in more than 56 countries. To learn more about HERE, visit http://360.here.com


About our on-device search team


Our software answers geographic searches on millions of mobile devices.Examples of search queries include street addresses, cities, landmarks and points of interest (POIs). We use locally stored map data to answer user queries, without the need for an online connection. Our challenges include answering these queries using the latest Information Retrieval (IR) techniques in resource-scarce environment. We develop efficient lookup methods and highly compressed indices based on world-class geo-data.


As a Senior C++ Engineer in our team, you will be:




  • Developing local search software for mobile and car


  • Reviewing C++ software design


  • Designing efficient data formats


  • Measuring and optimizing software performance

jobs.title: Senior JavaScript Engineer
jobs.content:
The Geo Insights team of Here Enterprise is responsible for big data crunching, analytics and cool visualization on HERE maps.


What will you do?


As part of the Enterprise team you will contribute by creating tools that allow platform partners, for instance media companies, to efficiently utilize HERE Maps on their services, shaping new ways of communication.


We are looking for an experienced professional with knowledge of the latest web technologies, with first class mastering of CSS and JavaScript. You love iterating on a piece of UI until it works just right. You've worked closely with designers to not only build user interfaces, but provide ideas and experiment with what's possible. You like to work hard to help people get as much done as quickly as possible. You're not precious about dropping into new technologies to see how things work. You are open-minded, flexible, down with dynamic and fast paced working environment, excited about fixing problems, and you're a team player.


As our JavaScript specialist, you will develop major frontend parts of our Geo Insights platform. In this position you will not just move some pixel, but develop the low-level JavaScript basis of our solution. Therefore, we are searching for a real Engineer that is able to do some heavy lifting without frameworks and is not afraid of some mathematic challenges. If you have passion for Maps and want to play a major role in developing a truly innovative, highly complex, large scale big data solution, we surely want to hear from you!  


What will you do?



  • Build a fast, reliable, scalable and fully customizable “consumer-grade” visualization platform based on Geo Data

  • Develop all the libraries needed for that

  • Build the JavaScript API used by 3rd party developers

  • Share your knowledge within a democratic team of experts, to achieve optimal solutions

jobs.title: Full stack web developer
jobs.content:
You'll be a part of the Arrivalguides tech team, building a better travel experience for millions of travellers around the world. From project planning with product owners, you design, develop and ship new features often. Our CI-toolchain with github, teamcity and octopus deploy frees you to focus on building value, both for our partners and end users.


Every now and then you'll sit in on partner on-boarding meetings, helping our B2B customers select the best way of integrating ArrivalGuides content into their online booking flow, In-flight entertainment system or mobile video solution. Other days you might shave 10ms of the load time on our API-endpoints or scratch an itch by adding some additional unit tests for that complex logic you wrote two weeks ago.

jobs.title: (Full Stack) JAVA / PHP Developer
jobs.content:
Basebone is looking for full stack JAVA / PHP Developers for its mobile billing, mobile marketing and mobile entertainment systems. We’re addicted to mobile, marketing and technology in a fast paced, ever changing industry and you will be joining a highly motivated and capable team.



Your Responsibilities


Develop and maintain Java and PHP highly optimized, fast code in a rapidly developing, dynamic, messaging connected environment


Write shell scripts, cron tabs, PHP CLI scripts etc.


Choosing the proper database solution (MySQL, Cassandra etc) for your code and optimizing the code and queries


Work in small teams, taking ownership of a business area and managing requirements and goals with company internal stakeholders independently. In other words, be the expert.


The benefits


Free catering / lunch & paid lunch break


As much coffee, tea and water as you can drink


Private healthcare


Life insurance


Daily fresh fruit


Short Fridays


Flexible work hours


Awesome Parties :-)

jobs.title: Mobile Architect
jobs.content: Som lösningsarkitekt inom mobilitet arbetar du nära våra kunder med att planera realiseringen av mobila lösningar utifrån deras verksamhet och befintliga IT-lösningar. Du använder dig av moderna metoder, frameworks och verktyg för att ta fram den bästa lösningen tillsammans med kund, och är också delaktig i säljaktiviteter.  Vi skapar affärsnytta genom digital transformation, det vill säga att digitalisera och automatisera våra kunders processer för ökad effektivitet och lönsamhet. Vår position på marknaden gör att vi får arbeta med de största kunderna i nyskapande projekt inom alla branscher och områden. Det gör möjligheterna större för dig att prova på olika roller i varierande projekt. Vi tror på frihet under ansvar och försöker skapa en prestigelös miljö där man törs utmana både sig själv och andra, och där man vågar misslyckas. Då lyckas man oftast. Och vi vet att man inte kan vara bra på jobbet om man inte också har ett privatliv. Därför är balans, trivsel och att ha kul viktiga ingredienser på Capgemini.

jobs.title: SharePoint Developer voor SharePoint 2013, 2016 en Office 365 projecten gezocht
jobs.content:
Werk met ons mee aan complexe SharePoint vraagstukken voor onze klanten. Wil jij jezelf blijven ontwikkelen en deel je graag jouw kennis met collega’s? Dan wil ons SharePoint team samenwerken met een collega zoals jij!



Jouw rol als SharePoint Developer



Als SharePoint Developer zet jij jouw kennis van SharePoint en het Microsoft .NET platform proactief in door te werken aan verschillende uitdagende projecten voor onze opdrachtgevers. Het niveau van de werkzaamheden is hoog. Je werkt voornamelijk aan implementaties van portals, intranetten en maatwerk SharePoint applicaties en realiseert zelfstandig nieuwe webparts, custom workflows en andere maatwerk .NET componenten. Daarbij ga je geen enkele uitdaging uit de weg.


Wie worden jouw collega’s?



Natuurlijk, jouw passie voor SharePoint draagt voor een groot deel bij aan je werkplezier als SharePoint Developer. Maar wij vinden een gezellige en inspirerende groep collega’s ook belangrijk. Jij komt terecht in een team van SharePoint specialisten en werkt nauw samen met onze Microsoft Certified Masters. Samenwerken en kennis delen staan binnen het team centraal. Tijdens maandelijkse meetings worden nieuwe technologieën en werkwijzen besproken. Daarnaast organiseert het team regelmatig workshops waarin ze samen met collega’s specifieke onderwerpen bestuderen en in de praktijk toepassen. En die kennisdeling beperkt zich niet alleen tot jullie groep. .NET collega’s en specialisten op het gebied van Windows Infrastructuur en SQL Server Platform komen vaak bij jullie over de vloer.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.company: AXIT Sp. z o.o. A Siemens Company

Senior Software Engineer

jobs.title: Java Developer met AngularJS ervaring gezocht
jobs.content:
Werk met ons mee aan uitdagende Java technologieën en projecten voor onze klanten. We zijn op zoek naar Java Developers die alles uit zichzelf willen halen. Die voorop willen lopen binnen het vakgebied en een tomeloze inzet hebben. Herken jij jezelf hierin? Dan wil ons Java team graag samenwerken met een collega zoals jij!



Jouw rol als Java Developer


Als Java Developer bij VX Company werk je mee aan enterprise, mobile en cloud gerelateerde projecten voor diverse en interessante opdrachtgevers. Je bent verantwoordelijk voor de ontwikkeling van functionaliteit in alle lagen van applicaties en werkt met de modernste technieken, ontwikkeltools en methoden. Het niveau van de werkzaamheden is hoog. Jouw kennis en enthousiasme wordt gevraagd in het ontwerpen en bouwen van moderne en stevige webbased enterprise applicaties volgens een Agile werkwijze.


Wie worden jouw collega’s?


Natuurlijk, jouw passie voor Java draagt voor een groot deel bij aan je werkplezier als Java Developer. Maar wij vinden een gezellige en inspirerende groep collega’s ook belangrijk. Jij komt terecht in een hecht team van 25 Java specialisten. Samenwerken en kennis delen staan binnen het team centraal. Tijdens maandelijkse meetings worden frameworks, nieuwe technologieën en werkwijzen besproken. Daarnaast komt het team minimaal één keer in het jaar een weekend samen om te coden en samen in de 'glazen bol' te kijken. En die kennisdeling beperkt zich niet alleen tot jullie groep. Specialisten op het gebied van DevOps, Mobile en Agile komen vaak bij jullie over de vloer.

jobs.title: Configuration Manager

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.content:
COMPANY/PROJECT BRIEF: SmartCloud Infoservices provides software development, testing and operations services to clients. This position is in a team that works with a US-based software product company as a development partner. Kind of like a “startup within a startup.” We are looking for a professional who likes challenges, wants to create software that impacts a vast client base and is biased towards action. This is the perfect opportunity for a developer who wants to work with the latest technologies, is a great problem-solver & communicator and wants to turbo-charge their learning, growth and career. We offer a fun environment, great pay, no bureaucracy, lots of independence and a great product in the health & wellness space to build on.


POSITION SUMMARY: As a Software Engineer, you will work full-time in the development life cycle, from specification, design, implementation through testing of new features and modules. You are responsible for developing code as part of a Scrum team. You will see results and make an impact immediately as the code you write goes directly into the product, will get shipped pretty quickly and be used by tens of thousands of businesses every day.

jobs.title: Site Reliability Engineer
jobs.content:
Join the financial revolution!


Join Kreditech and our team of over 200 professionals and become part of a transforming industry. From engineering, to design, to analytics, and collections, we do things differently and we reward great ideas, team work and persistence. We have a lot of work to do – and we want you to join us! As a part of our Infrastructure team, you will be responsible to make sure our mission critical applications and systems are reliable and ready for Internet scale.


Your role:



  • Be responsible for troubleshooting issues in our servers together with the application teams.

  • Closely work with other departments, such as Engineering, Business Intelligence, Data Science, and Cyber Security.

  • Ensure the applications running in the servers are correctly monitored.

  • Act as a bridge between application teams and the underlying infrastructure.

  • Be empowered to design and implement solutions to ensure our systems are properly reliable and monitored.

jobs.title: Java Developer
jobs.content: Som Javautvecklare arbetar du med utveckling av mobila tjänster, digitala kanaler och molntjänster hos både mindre kunder och större uppdragsgivare i globala projekt. Vi skapar affärsnytta genom digital transformation, det vill säga att digitalisera och automatisera våra kunders processer för ökad effektivitet och lönsamhet. Vår position på marknaden gör att vi får arbeta med de största kunderna i nyskapande projekt inom alla branscher och områden. Det gör möjligheterna större för dig att prova på olika roller i varierande projekt. Vi tror på frihet under ansvar och försöker skapa en prestigelös miljö där man törs utmana både sig själv och andra, och där man vågar misslyckas. Då lyckas man oftast. Och vi vet att man inte kan vara bra på jobbet om man inte också har ett privatliv. Därför är balans, trivsel och att ha kul viktiga ingredienser på Capgemini.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer Scala
jobs.content:
Join the financial revolution!


Are you passionate about technology and want to make a real change? Join Kreditech and our team of over 300 professionals and become part of a transforming industry. From engineering, to design, to analytics, and collections, we do things differently and we reward great ideas, team work and persistence. We have a lot of work to do – and we want you to join us!


Your Role



  • You will work on one of our core products. It allows third-party services like e-commerce platforms to integrate with our lending engine, thus provide to their customers a new way to finance their purchase - 100% online and instantly fast.

  • You will be empowered to design and implement major new features for developers and operators.

  • You will work closely with other departments, such as Product, Marketing and Data Science.

  • You will effectively estimate time to implement designs.

  • You will write and test code that survives at internet scale.

  • You will work hard to consistently make systems simpler.

jobs.title: Software Engineer - Security
jobs.content:
Join the financial revolution!


Are you passionate about Technology and want to make a real change? Join Kreditech and our team of over 300 professionals and become part of a transforming industry. From engineering, to design, to analytics, and collections, we do things differently and we reward great ideas, team work and persistence. We have a lot of work to do – and we want you to join us!


Software Security Team as a part of Security department focuses on injecting security into Kreditech platform starting from design and implementation. We are a technical team with strong backgrounds in both software engineering and software security. We design, implement and maintain critical security services. We work closely with other teams to improve the security as well as other strategic areas such as stability, performance and maintainability.


Your role



  • You will design and implement mission critical software components which deal with highly confidential data and components delivering security services

  • You will pioneer implementation and integration of new security tools and technologies inside the company.

  • You will contribute to system architecture.

  • You will effectively estimate time to implement designs.

  • You will write and test code that survives at internet scale.

  • You will maintain technical documentation.

  • You will consult other teams on secure coding practices.

  • You will work closely with other technical departments, such as Technology, Infrastructure and Data Science.

jobs.title: Engineer 3, Software Development
jobs.content:
Comcast brings together the best in media and technology. We drive innovation to create the world’s best entertainment and online experiences. As a Fortune 50 leader, we set the pace in a variety of innovative and fascinating businesses and create career opportunities across a wide range of locations and disciplines. We are at the forefront of change and move at an amazing pace, thanks to our remarkable people, who bring cutting-edge products and services to life for millions of customers every day. If you share in our passion for teamwork, our vision to revolutionize industries and our goal to lead the future in media and technology, we want you to fast-forward your career at Comcast.





Job Summary:

Responsible for planning and designing new software and web

applications. Analyzes, tests, and assists with the integration of new

applications. Documents all development activity. Assists with

training non-technical personnel. Has in-depth experience, knowledge

and skills in own discipline. Usually determines own work priorities.

Acts as a resource for colleagues with less experience.



Core Responsibilities:

- Collaborates with project stakeholders to identify product and

technical requirements. Conducts analysis to determine integration

needs.

- Designs new software and web applications, supports applications under

development, and customizes current applications. Assists with the

software update process for existing applications, and roll-outs of

software releases.

- Participates in training representatives and operations staff on

internally developed software applications.

- Researches, writes and edits documentation and technical requirements,

including software designs, evaluation plans, test results, technical

manuals and formal recommendations and reports.

- Monitors and evaluates competitive applications and products. Reviews

literature, patents and current practices relevant to the solution of

assigned projects.

- Provides technical leadership throughout the design process and

guidance with regards to practices, procedures and techniques. Serves as

a guide and mentor for junior-level Software Development Engineers.

- Works with Quality Assurance team to determine if applications fit

specification and technical requirements.

- Displays in-depth knowledge of engineering methodologies, concepts,

skills, and their application in the area of specified engineering

specialty.

- Displays in-depth knowledge of, and ability to apply, process design

and redesign skills. Presents and defends architectural, design, and

technical choices to internal audiences.

- Displays knowledge of, and ability to apply, project management

skills.

- Consistent exercise of independent judgment and discretion in matters

of significance.

- Regular, consistent and punctual attendance. Must be able to work

nights and weekends, variable schedule(s) as necessary.



-Experience having worked with C#.Net, Java, Telerik, Kend, MVC, Entity Framework, SQL Server, and Web APIs

- Other duties and responsibilities as assigned.



Job Specification:

- Bachelors Degree or Equivalent

- Engineering, Computer Science

- Generally requires 5-8 years related experience

jobs.title: Android Developer
jobs.content:
Comcast's Technology & Product organization works at the intersection of media and technology. Our innovative teams are continually developing and delivering products that transform the customer experience. From creating apps like TVGo to new features such as the Talking Guide on the X1 platform, we work every day to make a positive impact through innovation in the pursuit of building amazing products that are enjoyable, easy to use and accessible across all platforms. The team also develops and supports our evolving network architecture, including next-generation consumer systems and technologies, infrastructure and engineering, network integration and management tools, and technical standards.





The Challenge:





We are seeking an Android Developer to join our Advanced Applications Engineering group, which is responsible for creating and shipping mobile television experiences that delight our customers and exceed their expectations. Position title will be based on experience and technical competency.





The Role:





In this role you will collaborate with designers, testers, product managers, and other developers across the organization. While the primary responsibilities will include developing features for existing products and building new Android apps from scratch, you will have opportunities to contribute to all aspects of the products. You must be able to pick up new technologies and languages quickly, be a team player, and be able to adapt to changing business and customer demands. The ideal candidate will have experience building native mobile applications that rely on multiple web services and that operate at scale (thousands to millions of users).





Qualifications:





- Experience with the software development cycle: product specification, design, implementation, QA, release, and maintenance

- Experience creating mobile applications for a wide variety of devices and Android OS versions



- A strong sense of ownership and responsibility for code quality that follows best practices



- A passion for learning and adapting to new technologies



- Ability to multi-task and work under pressure



- Ability to see the big picture/the whole project, not just the piece you are working on





Relocation assistance available for qualified applicants.





Additional Responsibilities May Include:





Job Summary:



Responsible for planning and designing new software and web



applications. Analyzes, tests, and assists with the integration of new



applications. Oversees the documentation of all development activity.



Trains non-technical personnel. Assists with tracking performance



metrics. Integrates knowledge of business and functional priorities.



Acts as a key contributor in a complex and crucial environment.

technical requirements. Conducts analysis to determine integration



needs.



- Designs new software and web applications, supports applications under



development, and customizes current applications. Develops software

software releases.



- Keeps current with technological developments within the industry.



Monitors and evaluates competitive applications and products. Reviews



literature, patents, and current practices relevant to the solution of



assigned projects.



- Works with Quality Assurance team to determine if applications fit



specification and technical requirements.



- Consistent exercise of independent judgment and discretion in matters



of significance.



- Regular, consistent and punctual attendance. Must be able to work



nights and weekends, variable schedule(s) as necessary.



- Other duties and responsibilities as assigned.



Job Specification:



- Bachelors Degree or Equivalent



- Engineering, Computer Science

lower-level managers to non-exempt employees.

- Manages cross-project communications.

- Consistent exercise of independent judgment and discretion in matters

of significance.

- Regular, consistent and punctual attendance. Must be able to work

nights and weekends, variable schedule(s) as necessary.

- Regular, consistent and punctual attendance. Must be able to work nights and weekends, variable schedule(s) as necessary.

Core Requirements:

- Experience in monitoring best practices to ensure Reliability/Availability/Scalability/Maintainability targets are achieved

- Service Oriented architectures

- Leading edge technologies including NoSQL, Elastic Search, etc

- Knowledge of multi-geographic multi-active data center technologies including clustering, database replication, network topologies, and other tools to ensure high 24x7 system high availability

- Extensive knowledge in system architecture and ability to lead, review and provide feedback to teams of architects
